TopicTitle: [WIP - 0.25] Squad HD Re-texture Project - Continuous Release (July 25)

Articles.Content: Cool beans! Keep it up!

Hey, easy a bit what I meant to say is that 'double-sizing' textures (ex: 1024x1024 to 2048x2048) actually quadruples the size of the textures. Of course I do not want a 16x texture size increase

Hope this clears things up a bit

Phew, I was worried for a second, there.

So I tried with the poodle and an early humdrum stealing of texture from the Orion in Chaka Monkey Space Exploration for the Mk 1-2

Here's the result:

https://i.imgur.com/dlWXCZY.png

https://i.imgur.com/J0aKAY7.png

Edit: Whoops, just realized I doubled posted >.> Dammit, didn't see my early post

That looks very nice, actually. I feel like it needs more detail on the combustion chamber, and possibly also the bell, but it looks great for a rough draft.
These look great! I probably will not use them as I prefer stock style, but the textures look like they fit in with KW well. Well done, OP.

Here's the "LE 1-2 HSE-2" lol. because Poodle is too mainstream

I've been looking around for ideas. Here's the result

Here's the "LE 1-2 HSE-2" lol. because Poodle is too mainstream

I've been looking around for ideas. Here's the result

https://i.imgur.com/6aExSYO.png

Much better. Such engine. Wow.
I feel like the nozzle could be left without the rings. But if everyone disagrees, well, nevermind then

Edit, Kombobulus Modular Station? ._. W-What is that? Is that w-wha- I d- nevermind.

I'll try using Firespitter texture changer (b'_')b thank you

That's a big project I am working on. I also see you are using my "Kerpton" textures, which I allowed ChakaMonkey to use in his mod. Strange to see my textures spreading everywhere.

Yeah, I made a stretchy texture using your texture which I saw in Chaka Monkey so named it like that because it has its own thread. Thank you for the great re-tex

b

^ that was supposed to be a thumb

Nozzle rings can be easily disabled but I'd stick with those ribs for now since it looks quite plain without it.

Edit: Here's a draft for the LV T45. It has no bump maps so makes me sad. It's gonna be pure texturing.

Edited February 11, 2014 by blackheart612
That surely looks interesting, much more life-like. You should add some more texture to the valve on the left, though (the yellow thing)
That was just a draft. I'll go working on it when I got time

That's a big project I am working on. I also see you are using my "Kerpton" textures, which I allowed ChakaMonkey to use in his mod. Strange to see my textures spreading everywhere.

Nothke, how many projects are you working on? FlexRack, the Kerpton thingy, Particle Overhaul, and Kerbin City. Are you working on more things than that?

Yeah, I made a stretchy texture using your texture which I saw in Chaka Monkey so named it like that because it has its own thread. Thank you for the great re-tex

b

^ that was supposed to be a thumb

Nozzle rings can be easily disabled but I'd stick with those ribs for now since it looks quite plain without it.

Edit: Here's a draft for the LV T45. It has no bump maps so makes me sad. It's gonna be pure texturing.

http://i.imgur.com/GVTZSSF.png

I'd say darken the combustion chamber. It could use some darkening.

EDIT: Ooops, doublepost.

I thought it was too light, too. I'm still finding colors that will match the other colors atm. lol

Meanwhile, I really want to try out flexrack and obviously, nothke works more than he shows because he has hidden the tps pack he said he was making for DR or something like that.

MeCripp. Just read that comment. I am sorry but I didn't hook up firespitter there. If you are trying to do so, I have no idea how to do it yet but make sure that the model on your fairing is right so the texture changing is possible
